name: Hormel Foods Corporation
description: Hormel Foods Corporation is a multinational manufacturer and marketer of consumer-branded food products. Founded in 1891 by George A. Hormel in Austin, Minnesota, the company has evolved into a leader in the food industry, known for its commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainability. Hormel Foods offers a wide range of products, including meat and poultry, refrigerated and shelf-stable meals, snacks, and condiments. Some of its most recognized brands include Hormel®, Spam®, Jennie-O®, and Skippy®. The company operates through various segments, including Grocery Products, Refrigerated Foods, Jennie-O Turkey Store, and International & Other, focusing on creating products that meet the changing tastes and health preferences of consumers. Hormel Foods places a high emphasis on sustainability initiatives, aiming to reduce its environmental footprint and promote responsible sourcing. The company is dedicated to giving back to the communities it serves, supporting various charitable efforts and food donation programs. With a rich history and a forward-thinking approach, Hormel Foods continues to expand its portfolio and adapt to the dynamic food market, ensuring it remains a trusted name on tables across America and beyond.

seo.meta_title: Hormel Foods Corporation | Quality Food Products
seo.meta_description: Explore Hormel Foods Corporation, a leader in the food industry known for its innovative and quality food products. Discover the range of brands and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Hormel Foods produce?
faq.answer: Hormel Foods produces a variety of consumer-branded food products, including meats, meals, snacks, and condiments.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Hormel Foods?
faq.answer: Jim Snee is the CEO of Hormel Foods Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Hormel Foods headquartered?
faq.answer: Hormel Foods is headquartered in Austin, Minnesota, USA.

faq.question: What are some popular Hormel Foods brands?
faq.answer: Some popular brands include Hormel®, Spam®, Jennie-O®, and Skippy®.
